long_description: The Patagonia Reflip flip-flops keep feet comfortable during warm-weather outings. Synthetic leather straps wrap around the instep for a secure fit; nylon toe posts are comfortable between toes. Polyester jersey mesh linings keep feet comfortable. PLUSfoam closed-cell foam footbeds offer long-term cushioned comfort. PLUSfoam outsoles offers great traction on varied surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Reflip flip-flops keep feet comfortable during warm-weather outings.
